name: Discount Stores
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants selling a general line of merchandise at a discounted rate.
Products for sale may include apparel, housewares, home
furnishings, personal care products, and electronics. Such merchants
typically operate a garden shop, have a primary checkout location at
the front of the store, and promote and advertise low prices on an
ongoing basis.
